name: Blue Whale Apps
tagline: Creating Apps Since the App Store Started
description:
Blue Whale Apps is an industry-leading web, mobile and cloud app development company based in Washington DC. At Blue Whale Apps, we have award-winning strategists, team of design thinkers and software developers who are passionate about creating mobile apps and digital products for businesses of all sizes across the globe.
 
Our Technical Areas of Expertise:
 
AI/ML Development Services
API Integration Services
Mobile, Web and Cloud Design and Development
Hybrid and Native App Development
App Store Optimization and Marketing
Conversion Rate Optimization
IT Technology Consulting
App Testing Services
Product Design and Strategy
Mobile Backend Engineering
Security & Compliance
CRM, ERP and POS Application development
